EmailTemplate.description: For sending to customers when a sample request is submitted
EmailTemplate.name: Sample Request Submitted
EmailTemplate.subject: Your sample request has been submitted!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
Your sample request with DuPont Protection Technologies has been submitted! You should receive an email within the next 48 hours confirming that your sample has shipped.
Request ID: {!Request__c.Name}
The sample will be sent to the address below.
{!Lead.Address}
If you have any questions regarding this order, please respond to this email or call Customer Service at 1-800-931-3456. Please have the request ID on hand so that customer service can quickly respond to your inquiry.
Thank you.
